purpose: To provide a detailed preparation guide for individuals aiming to succeed in Machine Learning and Data Science interviews.
principle: Organizes content and exercises around key topics in Machine Learning and Data Science, including algorithms, system design, and problem-solving.
reusability: The guide can be used by individuals preparing for interviews or by educators as a supplementary resource for teaching ML concepts.
limitations: Primarily focused on preparation for interviews, may not cover the latest advancements in the field comprehensively.
name: MLE-DS-Interview-Prep-Guide
description: This repo is meant to serve as a detailed guide for Machine Learning/AI interviews.
highlight: Comprehensive guide for preparing for Machine Learning and Data Science interviews, covering algorithms, design, and practical exercises.
